heading: harvest time
subheading: the wired investment portfolio time to reap what has been sowed. heading into the dog days of summer – historically a tech-stock doldrum – i’m selling 1,000 shares of aol and all of lucent, mmc networks, nextel, and pilot network services. i’m picking up 3,000 shares of the new at&t-liberty media tracking stock and 6,000 […]
